content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two distinct structures built with colored blocks:

## Structure 1 (Left Side):
This appears to be a small building or house-like structure with:
- A red base with two arch-shaped cutouts (resembling a bridge)
- A horizontal yellow rectangular block on top of the red base
- Two green cube blocks on the left side of the yellow block
- One green rectangular block on the right side of the yellow block
- A blue cube block on top of the right green rectangular block
- An orange triangular roof piece on top of the blue cube

## Structure 2 (Right Side):
This appears to be a rectangular frame or portal structure with:
- A green rectangular block at the bottom
- Three layers on the right side consisting of: red cube, blue cube, red cube (bottom to top)
- A green rectangular block at the top
- A tall yellow rectangular block forming the left side of the frame

## Block Count and Layers:
- Structure 1: 7 blocks total, with 3 layers (red base, yellow middle, green/blue/orange top)
- Structure 2: 7 blocks total, with a frame-like arrangement (4 blocks vertically on right, 1 block each on top and bottom, 1 tall block on left)

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on the target structures, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:

For Structure 1:
- Red arch block (index 1) - for the base
- Yellow horizontal rectangular block (index 12) - for the middle layer
- Green cube blocks (index 5) - need two of these for the top left
- Green horizontal rectangular block (index 11) - for the top right
- Blue cube block (index 4) - on top of right green block
- Orange triangular roof (index 16) - for the very top

For Structure 2:
- Green horizontal rectangular blocks (index 11) - need two for top and bottom
- Red cube blocks (index 6) - need two for top and bottom right side
- Blue cube block (index 4) - for middle right side
- Yellow tall rectangular block (index 13) - for the left side of the frame

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 12
    Step3: Move block with index 5
    Step4: Move block with index 5
    Step5: Move block with index 11
    Step6: Move block with index 4
    Step7: Move block with index 16
    Step8: Move block with index 11
    Step9: Move block with index 6
    Step10: Move block with index 4
    Step11: Move block with index 6
    Step12: Move block with index 11
    Step13: Move block with index 13
}
```

This assembly sequence first builds the house-like structure on the left (steps 1-7), then constructs the rectangular frame structure on the right (steps 8-13).
